title: JD.com and Ant Group Lobby for Yuan-Based Stablecoins in Hong Kong
summary: Chinese tech giants JD.com and Ant Group are reportedly lobbying China's central bank to approve yuan-denominated stablecoins for use in Hong Kong. This represents a significant push for Chinese entities to establish a foothold in the digital currency space, potentially challenging existing USD-based stablecoins.

title: Amber International Raises $25.5M to Expand $100M Crypto Reserve
summary: Amber International secured $25.5 million in funding led by Pantera Capital to grow its $100 million cryptocurrency reserve portfolio. The reserve holds major assets including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, BNB, XRP, and SUI, with funds earmarked for tokenization and AgentFi projects.

title: Nano Labs Acquires $50M in BNB, Targets 10% of Total Supply
summary: Nano Labs purchased 74,315 BNB tokens worth $50 million through OTC markets, increasing its total crypto reserves to $160 million. The company has ambitious plans to accumulate up to 10% of BNB's total supply alongside holding 1,000 BTC.

title: Ondo Finance and Pantera Capital Launch $250M RWA Investment Initiative
summary: Ondo Finance partnered with Pantera Capital to deploy $250 million into Real World Asset (RWA) projects, targeting both equity investments and project token acquisitions. This represents one of the largest dedicated funds for RWA tokenization, signaling institutional confidence in the sector.
